story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist operates within institutional structure, initially unaware of gradual exclusion mechanisms
story_skeleton.act_2: Systematic forces incrementally strip protagonist of social standing, community access, or institutional protection
story_skeleton.act_3: Complete displacement reveals itself as structural inevitability, not individual failure

story_skeleton.act_1: Domestic space presented as refuge or safety zone under protagonist control
story_skeleton.act_2: Systematic forces convert safety mechanisms into control apparatus, restricting protagonist movement or agency
story_skeleton.act_3: Sanctuary revealed as prison, protective systems exposed as confinement architecture

story_skeleton.act_1: Medical crisis necessitates institutional intervention for survival
story_skeleton.act_2: Financial obligations compound, institutional mechanisms shift from healing to extraction
story_skeleton.act_3: Survival costs destroy life, healthcare system revealed as existential threat

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist identity functions normally within digital authentication systems
story_skeleton.act_2: Technological duplicate operates autonomously, authentic self becomes indistinguishable from copy
story_skeleton.act_3: Protagonist cannot prove authenticity, self becomes the false copy in social perception

story_skeleton.act_1: Domestic technology installed for convenience and security enhancement
story_skeleton.act_2: Surveillance apparatus monitors, records, and controls protagonist behavior within home
story_skeleton.act_3: Comfort technology revealed as surveillance infrastructure, home autonomy eliminated

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist body functions as integrated self-system with clear boundaries
story_skeleton.act_2: Internal contamination spreads, boundary between self and foreign entity dissolves
story_skeleton.act_3: Body becomes threat vector, protagonist embodies the contamination source

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist enters medical system under presumption of care and consent
story_skeleton.act_2: Institutional mechanisms extract value, control bodily agency, or conduct unauthorized intervention
story_skeleton.act_3: Medical authority exposed as exploitation apparatus, consent revealed as illusion

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist enters transitional space intended for temporary passage
story_skeleton.act_2: Spatial logic prevents exit, transitional environment extends indefinitely without destination
story_skeleton.act_3: Permanent confinement in purposeless space, escape architecturally impossible

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist enters rural space with buried historical trauma or cultural memory
story_skeleton.act_2: Historical entities possess landscape, structures, or protagonist behavior patterns
story_skeleton.act_3: Buried historical violence revealed through possession, past trauma inescapable in space

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist occupies communal housing structure with class or social positioning stakes
story_skeleton.act_2: Behavior monitoring by neighbors or institution enforces conformity, violations recorded and escalated
story_skeleton.act_3: Social displacement becomes inevitable, surveillance system cannot be escaped within housing structure

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist joins collective organization presented as beneficial community or opportunity
story_skeleton.act_2: Group mechanisms extract value, isolate protagonist from external identity, enforce conformity
story_skeleton.act_3: Exploitation structure revealed, collective identity shown as erasure mechanism

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist relies on infrastructure systems for communication, mobility, or resource access
story_skeleton.act_2: Systematic infrastructure failure eliminates connection vectors, confinement increases with each system collapse
story_skeleton.act_3: Complete isolation through infrastructure decay, systemic restoration impossible

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist participates in digital collective creation or transmission
story_skeleton.act_2: Collective narrative spreads virally, individual authorship erased through collaborative iteration
story_skeleton.act_3: Protagonist becomes subject of own collective creation, transmission loop completes

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist maintains survival through economic participation in systematic structure
story_skeleton.act_2: Economic forces incrementally eliminate survival resources, each loss compounds vulnerability
story_skeleton.act_3: Complete economic annihilation revealed as systemic function, survival structurally impossible

story_skeleton.act_1: Protagonist inhabits domestic space with inherited or unresolved historical trauma
story_skeleton.act_2: Past trauma patterns possess current behavior, protagonist identity consumed by historical repetition
story_skeleton.act_3: Protagonist enacts trauma origin, generational cycle completes and restarts
